info.name: Hitobito Login
info.description: **A login integration for [Hitobito](https://github.com/hitobito/hitobito)** - **Group and Role mapping!** Map role/group combinations from hitobito to nextcloud groups - **User info sync** Information like displayname, e-mail, address, birthday is synced from hitobito to nextcloud - **E-Mail detection** Existing users can be linked to their hitobito account based on their e-mail - **Block unknown users** Users not fiting a role/group mapping can be blocked from accessing nextcloud - **Automatic group removal** A user can be automatically removed from nextcloud groups if the mapping no longer applies
